That's why it's mandatory we prepare the document before proceeding with the transfer. The bank can not just transfer that huge amount to your account without sending this above mentioned document to your bank, for them to know where the money is coming from.Â I hope you now understand what the document is meant for and it'sÂ  importance regarding to your Transfer.Â Get back to me now.Â Alva White.
